me.bhop.bjdautilities

Class ReactionMenu.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.bhop.bjdautilities.menu.ReactionMenu.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    ReactionMenu

    public static class ReactionMenu.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    A convenient builder for creating ReactionMenus.

      • onClick

        public ReactionMenu.Builder onClick(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.util.function.Consumer<ReactionMenu> action)
        Add a click listener for an emote. This will automatically add the emote to the starting emote list.
        Parameters:
        name - the emote name
        action - the action to be called when the emote is clicked

      • onClick

        public ReactionMenu.Builder onClick(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.util.function.BiConsumer<ReactionMenu,net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.User> action)
        Add a click listener for an emote. This listener, however, supplies both the menu and the User who added the reaction. This will automatically add the emote to the starting emote list.
        Parameters:
        name - the emote name
        action - the action to be called when the emote is clicked

      • onRemove

        public ReactionMenu.Builder onRemove(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.util.function.Consumer<ReactionMenu> action)
        Add a remove listener for an emote.
        Parameters:
        name - the emote name
        action - the action to be called when the emote is removed

      • onRemove

        public ReactionMenu.Builder onRemove(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.util.function.BiConsumer<ReactionMenu,net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.User> action)
        Add a remove listener for an emote. This listener, however, supplies both the menu and the User who added the reaction.
        Parameters:
        name - the emote name
        action - the action to be called when the emote is removed
